import React from 'react' import Bussiness_Sidebar from '../Bussiness_Sidebar'; import Navbar from '../Navbar'; import { useNavigate, useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import { useState } from 'react'; import { useEffect } from 'react'; const AddnewUserUpdates = () => { const navigate =useNavigate() const [title, setTitle] = useState(); const [userfirst, setUserFirst] = useState(); const [Userlast, setUserLast] = useState(); const [UserEmail, setUserEmail] = useState(); const [username, setUsername] = useState(); const [Userpassword, setUserPassword] = useState(); const [UsercPassword, setUserCPassword] = useState(); const [UserRole, setUserRole] = useState(); const [UserSalesCommision, setUserSalesCommission] = useState(); const [UserMaxsalesDiscount, setUserMaxSalesDiscount] = useState(); const [UserBirth, setUserBirth] = useState(); const [USerGender, setUserGender] = useState(); const [UserBloodGroup, setUserBloodGroup] = useState(); const [UserNumber, setUserNumber] = useState(); const [UserFamilyNumber, setUserFamilyNumber] = useState(); const [UserAccountHolder, setUserAccountHolder] = useState(); const [UserAccountNumber, setUserAccountNumber] = useState(); const [UserBankName, setUserBankName] = useState(); const [UserBankIdentifi, setUserBankIdentifi] = useState(); const [UserBranch, setUserBranch] = useState(); const [UserTaxPay, setUserTaxPay] = useState(); const [error, setError] = useState(false); const params = useParams(); useEffect(() => { getAllHospitalDetails(); }, []) const getAllHospitalDetails = async () => { console.warn(params) let result = await fetch(`http://localhost:5000/hospital/${params.id}`); result = await result.json(); console.log("result", result); setTitle(result.hospitalname); setUserFirst(result.hospitalAddress); setUserLast(result.hospitaldetail); setUserAccountHolder(result.hospitalstate); setUserBankName(result.hospitalcity); } const userGender =(e)=>{ setUserGender(e.target.value) } const AddNewUserHandler = async (e) => { // e.prevesntdefault('') if (!title || !userfirst || !Userlast || !USerGender || !username || !UserEmail || !Userpassword || !UsercPassword || !UserBirth ||!UserRole || !UserSalesCommision || !UserMaxsalesDiscount || !USerGender || !UserBloodGroup || !UserNumber || !UserFamilyNumber || !UserAccountHolder || !UserAccountNumber || !UserBankName || !UserBankIdentifi || !UserBranch || !UserTaxPay ) { setError(true); return false } const userId = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('user'))._id; let result = await fetch("http://localhost:8000/user-management", { method: "post", body: JSON.stringify({ title,userfirst ,Userlast , UserEmail, UserBirth, username, Userpassword,UsercPassword,UserRole,UserSalesCommision,UserMaxsalesDiscount, USerGender ,UserBloodGroup ,UserNumber ,UserFamilyNumber ,UserAccountHolder ,UserAccountNumber, UserBankName ,UserBankIdentifi ,UserBranch ,UserTaxPay , userId }), headers: { "Content-type": "application/json" } }); result = await result.json(); navigate("/user-management") console.log("reult", result); // console.log(dob, age, month, days); } return ( <>
